question.title: How to get Geo data through Internet?

node.contents: In an android app, I have written code to get geo data through GPS or Network, which one is enable get the data through that. Here is my code,

astNode.text: In an android app, I have written code to get geo data through GPS or Network, which one is enable get the data through that. Here is my code,

elements.contents: public boolean getLocation(Context context, LocationResult result) { boolean gps_enabled=false; LocationManager lm; boolean network_enabled=false; this.context = context; locationResult=result; Toast.makeText( context,"getLocation()",Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); if(lm == null) lm = (LocationManager) context.getSystemService(Context.LOCATION_SERVICE); try { gps_enabled=lm.isProviderEnabled(LocationManager.GPS_PROVIDER); } catch(Exception ex){} try { network_enabled=lm.isProviderEnabled(LocationManager.NETWORK_PROVIDER); } catch(Exception ex){} if(!gps_enabled && !network_enabled) { Toast.makeText(context, "GPS & Network disabled", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); return false; } }

units.rawText: public boolean getLocation(Context context, LocationResult result) { boolean gps_enabled=false; LocationManager lm; boolean network_enabled=false; this.context = context; locationResult=result; Toast.makeText( context,"getLocation()",Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); if(lm == null) lm = (LocationManager) context.getSystemService(Context.LOCATION_SERVICE); try { gps_enabled=lm.isProviderEnabled(LocationManager.GPS_PROVIDER); } catch(Exception ex){} try { network_enabled=lm.isProviderEnabled(LocationManager.NETWORK_PROVIDER); } catch(Exception ex){} if(!gps_enabled && !network_enabled) { Toast.makeText(context, "GPS & Network disabled", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); return false; } }

node.contents: Using LocationManager check whether GPS & NetWork is on or not.

astNode.text: Using LocationManager check whether GPS & NetWork is on or not.

node.contents: If GPS is in ON, in boolean value gps_enabled assigned "true".

astNode.text: If GPS is in ON, in boolean value gps_enabled assigned "true".

node.contents: But in network, I have activated 2G Internet access in HTC desire android device, and Switched ON in Mobile network.

astNode.text: But in network, I have activated 2G Internet access in HTC desire android device, and Switched ON in Mobile network.

node.contents: The boolean variable network_enabled assigned to "false" even network in On state.

astNode.text: The boolean variable network_enabled assigned to "false" even network in On state.

node.contents: Are we want to change in settings anything in device? or any mistake in my code?

astNode.text: Are we want to change in settings anything in device? or any mistake in my code?

node.contents: No. I have switched on the nework in device, but in variable showed network_enabled = false at debug time and data is not availabled through network. That is my issue.

astNode.text: No. I have switched on the nework in device, but in variable showed network_enabled = false at debug time and data is not availabled through network. That is my issue.

node.contents: That is not the issue i have used this code, When i debug the code, the variable assigned network_enabled= false, but i have ON the mobile network. why?

astNode.text: That is not the issue i have used this code, When i debug the code, the variable assigned network_enabled= false, but i have ON the mobile network. why?

node.contents: You mean, if you set network_enabled=false..but still the symbol of network WiFi on your device shows as ON??

astNode.text: You mean, if you set network_enabled=false..but still the symbol of network WiFi on your device shows as ON??

node.contents: NETWORK_PROVIDER: Name of the network location provider. This provider determines location based on availability of cell tower and WiFi access points. Results are retrieved by means of a network lookup. Requires either of the permissions android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.

astNode.text: NETWORK_PROVIDER: Name of the network location provider. This provider determines location based on availability of cell tower and WiFi access points. Results are retrieved by means of a network lookup. Requires either of the permissions android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.

node.contents: GPS_PROVIDER : Name of the GPS location provider. This provider determines location using satellites. Depending on conditions, this provider may take a while to return a location fix. Requires the permission android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.

astNode.text: GPS_PROVIDER : Name of the GPS location provider. This provider determines location using satellites. Depending on conditions, this provider may take a while to return a location fix. Requires the permission android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.
